mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DATE, b.UPDATE_DATE, u.USER_ID, u.NAME, u.EMAIL, u.REG_DATE AS USER_REG_DATE FROM tb_board b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DATE, b.UPDATE_DATE, u.USER_ID, u.NAME, u.EMAIL, u.REG_DATE AS USER_REG_DATE FROM tb_board b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from TB_BOARD where USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DATE, b.UPDATE_DATE, u.USER_ID, u.NAME, u.EMAIL, u.REG_DATE AS USER_REG_DATE FROM tb_board b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BOARD(USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{board.title}, CONTENT = #{board.content}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
